text: The Christmas Attic is the second studio album by Trans-Siberian Orchestra, an American rock band. It was released on September 15, 1998. It was released again in 2001 with more music. The album has many songs that are based on Christmas music. It also has instrumental songs. The album is certified platinum by the RIAA. It went onto the Billboard 200, an American music chart. == Track listing == == References == Category:1998 albums Category:Christmas albums
title: The Christmas Attic
